languages.text: "Души эльдаров питали своими силами Дом Орселлио почти три столетия. Я... хочу все сделать правильно, {name}. Не нужно лишней крови".

traits.locale_text: "Души эльдар питали своими силами Дом Орселлио почти три столетия. Я... хочу все сделать правильно, {name}. Не нужно лишней крови".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "The Aeldari souls nourished House Orsellio with their strength for nearly three centuries. I... want to do this right, {name}. No more blood need be shed."
languages.original_text: "Души эльдаров питали своими силами Дом Орселлио почти три столетия. Я... хочу все сделать правильно, {name}. Не нужно лишней крови".

traits.locale_text: "The Aeldari souls nourished House Orsellio with their strength for nearly three centuries. I... want to do this right, {name}. We don't need bloodshed that we can avoid."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Aeldari souls nourished House Orsellio with their strength for nearly three centuries. I... want to do this right, {name}. We don't need bloodshed that we can avoid."

traits.locale_text: "The Aeldari souls nourished House Orsellio with their strength for nearly three centuries. I... want to do this right, {name}. No more blood need be shed."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Aeldari souls nourished House Orsellio with their strength for nearly three centuries. I... want to do this right, {name}. No more blood need be shed."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「おおよそ3世紀にわたり、アエルダリの魂はオーセリオ家に力を与えました。あたくしは…この権利を行使したいのです、{name}様。これ以上の流血は無用です」
languages.original_text: "The Aeldari souls nourished House Orsellio with their strength for nearly three centuries. I... want to do this right, {name}. No more blood need be shed."

traits.locale_text: 「おおよそ3世紀にわたり、アエルダリの魂はオーセリオ家に力を与えました。あたくしは…この権利を行使したいのです、{name}様。これ以上の流血は無用です」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “那些艾达灵族的灵魂已经滋养了奥赛罗家族近三百年。我……我想做正确的事情，{name}，不该再有流血冲突了。”
languages.original_text: "The Aeldari souls nourished House Orsellio with their strength for nearly three centuries. I... want to do this right, {name}. No more blood need be shed."

traits.locale_text: “那些艾达灵族的灵魂已经滋养了奥塞罗家族近三百年。我……我想做正确的事情，{name}。我们不需要流血冲突，这场冲突是可以避免的。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « La maison Orsellio a exploité les âmes des Aeldaris pendant près de trois siècles, {name}. Je... je veux faire ça bien. Inutile de faire couler plus de sang. »
languages.original_text: "The Aeldari souls nourished House Orsellio with their strength for nearly three centuries. I... want to do this right, {name}. No more blood need be shed."

traits.locale_text: « La maison Orsellio a exploité les âmes des Aeldaris pendant près de trois siècles, {name}. Je... je veux faire ça bien. Inutile de faire couler le sang. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Las almas de los Aeldari han alimentado a la casa Orsellio con su fuerza durante casi tres siglos. Quiero... hacer lo correcto, {name}. No hace falta derramar más sangre».
languages.original_text: "The Aeldari souls nourished House Orsellio with their strength for nearly three centuries. I... want to do this right, {name}. No more blood need be shed."

traits.locale_text: «Las almas de los Aeldari han alimentado a la casa Orsellio con su fuerza durante casi tres siglos. Quiero... hacer lo correcto, {name}. No tenemos por qué derramar sangre cuando hay otro camino».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Aeldari-Seelen haben Haus Orsellio fast drei Jahrhunderte lang mit ihrer Stärke genährt. Ich ... will das richtig machen, {name}. Es muss kein Blut mehr vergossen werden."
languages.original_text: "The Aeldari souls nourished House Orsellio with their strength for nearly three centuries. I... want to do this right, {name}. No more blood need be shed."

traits.locale_text: "Die Aeldari-Seelen haben Haus Orsellio fast drei Jahrhunderte lang mit ihrer Stärke genährt. Ich ... will das richtig machen, {name}. Wir brauchen kein Blutvergießen, dass wir vermeiden können."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Aeldari ruhları, neredeyse üç yüzyıldır Orsellio Hanesi'ne güçleriyle destek veriyor. Ben... Bu işi usulüne uygun yapmak istiyorum {name}. Daha fazla kan dökülmesin."
languages.original_text: "The Aeldari souls nourished House Orsellio with their strength for nearly three centuries. I... want to do this right, {name}. No more blood need be shed."

traits.locale_text: "Aeldari ruhları, neredeyse üç yüzyıldır Orsellio Hanesi'ne güçleriyle destek veriyor. Ben... Bu işi usulüne uygun yapmak istiyorum {name}. Daha fazla kan dökülmesine gerek yok."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
